creator: michal@billbird.pl
text:
Will help in debugging, in case there is a lot of threads, and there is one more 
with meaningless name.

The architecture of Watchdogs will be changed in log4j 1.3. We'll keep your 
request in mind.
creator: ceki@apache.org

text: Would you maybe accept a patch? This is so trivial to achieve...

text:
Does this get anyone's attention?
It's 10 years old by now, please accept a patch...

I just realized it was fixed with 1.2.15rc5.
Great, thanks.
